title: How is it installed?
comment: Does it require invasive surgery? This could be dangerous and cause infections. Could also divert away medical attention from accidents and emergencies etc.

title: Children using them?
comment: Probably safer if parents also have control over children's implant, but should they have the power to do this? It could help children get well rested though, meaning they learn more in school.

title: Useful for those in poor conditions
comment: For those in rough conditions e.g., during war or in uncomfortable conditions they could get to sleep more easily

title: Poorer people couldn't afford
comment: If these implants are expensive it could increase the divide between those who can and can't afford the devices, potentially reducing job opportunities for those that can't.

title: Job's requiring it?
comment: If people need these for jobs then they might get them even though they don't want to - this could reduce job opportunities for people who don't want them or can't afford them.

title: What if you need to wake up?
Improve concentration by being more awake
Could become reliant on it
comment: Might make it harder for people to sleep without one

title: Unhealthy
comment: research is needed on potential health effects

title: Save time trying to get to sleep
comment: Efficient as you don't waste time trying to fall asleep
